parameter.name: Create DB and DB User Connection String
parameter.description: Automatically sets the connection string for the connection request.
parameter.defaultValue: Server={Database Server};Database={Database Name};uid={Database Administrator};Pwd={Database Administrator Password};

parameter.name: DatabaseUsername
parameter.description: User name to access you application database.

parameter.name: DatabasePassword
parameter.description: Password to access you application database.

parameter.name: BaseUrl
parameter.description: The Base Url of your site.

parameter.name: AppPath
parameter.description: Full site path where you want to install your application (for example, Default Web Site/Application).

parameter.name: Root VirtualDirectory Path
parameter.description: Physical path where files for this Web application will be deployed.
